So, after we determined that we needed the blueprints to the I-Cup facility,
we met with that architect, John Architect, who then told us to go to the Black Rock Development and Real Estate Association building
where we managed to retrieve the blueprints.
The other items we need to gather in the next 5 days are
1) A way to perform a successful biometric scan matching Fatima Von Kissyface, the head of the ICUP facility
2) Quantum crypto credentials that we can use to download the funds
3) Love Slime that Barry Gee can use to build a bomb to blow up the vault
and golden bullets that Travis Ocelot can use to disable security system in the facility.

but without the other items though, this will be tough either way.
